response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item carries a significant value of $10,000 to me, reflecting its exceptional quality, craftsmanship, and the time invested in its creation. I am confident it could bring immense value to your collection or endeavors. Considering its intrinsic worth and the opportunity it presents, I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product at the same price of $10,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable piece with you.", "product_price": 10000}
